name: deployrr
description: Deployrr is a deployment manager for Minecraft servers built to automate installation, version upgrades, plugin management, and backups. It offers a clean web UI aimed at server admins and gaming communities.
features: Automated Installation: Deploy Minecraft servers with one click. No manual setup needed.
Version Management: Upgrade server versions automatically. Stay current effortlessly.
Plugin Control: Install and manage plugins easily. Extend server functionality.
Backup Automation: Schedule regular world backups. Never lose progress.
Web Dashboard: Clean interface for all server operations. Manage without SSH.
Community-Focused: Built for gaming communities and server admins. Perfect for multiplayer hosting.
